name: Pass (Jjagg)
description:
A minimalist game where you pass a ball between your characters to score points.

Made for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018. The theme of the jam was "'Genre' without 'Mechanic'". My idea was a football (soccer) game without a goal. Not the strongest idea, but I'm pretty happy with the end result.

Software

  • Veldrid (Graphics abstraction)
  • OpenWheels (High level rendering)
  • OpenWindow (Windowing)
  • SixLabors.ImageSharp and SixLabors.Fonts (Font loading and text rendering)
